about_the_game:
About this game:

“The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown.” - Howard Phillips Lovecraft

“The greatest fear in the world is the fear of the unknown.” - Helen Keller

“The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.” - Franklin D. Roosevelt

1. Be constantly vigilant to avoid accidental death
You might end up in the wrong place and get electrocuted.
You might end up in the wrong place and get bitten by a rat.
You might end up in the wrong place and get struck by lightning.
You might end up in the wrong place and get harassed by cockroaches.
You might accidentally ingest harmful food or drinks.
The player character needs to constantly experiment and explore in the game to avoid entering the wrong place and suffering accidental injury or even death.

2. The player character has health and hunger stats.

Health decreases when the character takes damage, and when it reaches zero, the character dies. So the player needs to control the character to avoid various accidental injuries.

Hunger decreases over time, and when it reaches zero, the character also dies. Hunger can be replenished by obtaining food and drinks, but please note that if the player character consumes expired food and drinks, their hunger will not increase, but will instead decrease.

The player's ultimate goal is to keep their character alive and avoid accidental death! I hope the character can survive for as long as possible!

3. Story Background
Sasha was a nurse in a private hospital in New York City.
While she was cleaning a wound for a patient, she suddenly got transported to this dimension.
Sasha was scared and worried, and she missed her mother and pet in New York.
She was determined to find a way home, but this dimension was full of unknown dangers.
Sasha was always on the brink of death, and her journey home was destined to be difficult.

Do you believe that everyone's destiny is pre-determined?
That God has a program for us, and we can't escape it?
Even if death brushes past us, it will still come back for us.
Are you ready to accept your destiny?

Key Features:



Sci-Fi Horror - A unique blend of science fiction and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
Story-Driven Exploration - Immerse yourself in a gripping storyline and uncover the secrets of the maze. Your choices and actions will determine Sasha's fate as she faces the horrors that lurk within.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 1.8 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 3GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA graphic card, with at least 4GB of dedicated VRAM and with at least DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.

short_description: Arrival of DeadIt is a third-person horror game about survival and death. There is a witty and beautiful girl who is always on the verge of life and death. Don't panic, don't be afraid.
